mapper.select: select * from user where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
SELECT name,description FROM `user` right JOIN user_role on user_role.uid = user.id right JOIN role on role.id = user_role.rid where username = #{username}
SELECT name,description FROM `user` right JOIN user_permission on user_permission.uid = user.id right JOIN permission on permission.id = user_permission.pid where username = #{username}
